title: shrI harE nArAyaNa
sahitya:
shrI harE nArAyaNa shaurE jaya jaya krSNa murArE jaya jaya


anupallavi

  mOha mAyaiyil mUzhgi azhindu mUrkhanennaik-kai tUkkiyaruL jaya


caraNam    Agama vEda purANam ellAm pugazhum puruSOttama shrIpatiyE
  nAga shayana para vAsudEva lakSmIpatE sharaNam sharaNam jaya
